00002 #include "peripherals/hmc5843.h"

00004 #include "mcu_periph/i2c.h"

00006 struct ImuAspirin imu_aspirin;
00007 
00008 /* initialize peripherals */
00009 static void configure_gyro(void);
00010 static void configure_accel(void);
00011 //static void configure_mag(void);
00012 
00013 static void send_i2c_msg_with_retry(struct i2c_transaction* t) {
00014   uint8_t max_retry = 8;
00015   uint8_t nb_retry = 0;
00016   do {
00017     i2c_submit(&i2c2, t);
00018     while(I2C_GetFlagStatus(I2C2, I2C_FLAG_BUSY));
00019     while (t->status == I2CTransPending || t->status == I2CTransRunning);
00020     if (t->status == I2CTransFailed)
00021       nb_retry++;
00022   }
00023   while (t->status != I2CTransSuccess && nb_retry < max_retry);
00024 }
00025 
00026 void imu_impl_init(void) {
00027 
00028   imu_aspirin.status = AspirinStatusUninit;
00029   imu_aspirin.gyro_available_blaaa = FALSE;
00030   imu_aspirin.mag_available = FALSE;
00031   imu_aspirin.accel_available = FALSE;
00032 
00033   imu_aspirin.i2c_trans_gyro.type = I2CTransTxRx;
00034   imu_aspirin.i2c_trans_gyro.buf[0] = ITG3200_REG_GYRO_XOUT_H;
00035   imu_aspirin.i2c_trans_gyro.slave_addr = ITG3200_ADDR;
00036   imu_aspirin.i2c_trans_gyro.len_w = 1;
00037   imu_aspirin.i2c_trans_gyro.len_r = 6;
00038   imu_aspirin.i2c_trans_gyro.status = I2CTransFailed;
00039 
00040   imu_aspirin_arch_init();
00041   hmc5843_init();
00042 
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 void imu_periodic(void) {
00047   hmc5843_periodic();
00048   if (imu_aspirin.status == AspirinStatusUninit) {
00049     configure_gyro();
00050     configure_accel();
00051     imu_aspirin_arch_int_enable();
00052     imu_aspirin.status = AspirinStatusIdle;
00053   } else {
00054     imu_aspirin.gyro_available_blaaa = TRUE;
00055     imu_aspirin.time_since_last_reading++;
00056     imu_aspirin.time_since_last_accel_reading++;
00057     if (imu_aspirin.time_since_last_accel_reading > ASPIRIN_ACCEL_TIMEOUT) {
00058       configure_accel();
00059       imu_aspirin.time_since_last_accel_reading=0;
00060     }
00061   }
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 /* sends a serie of I2C commands to configure the ITG3200 gyro */
00067 static void configure_gyro(void) {
00068   struct i2c_transaction t;
00069   t.type = I2CTransTx;
00070   t.slave_addr = ITG3200_ADDR;
00071   /* set gyro range to 2000deg/s and low pass at 256Hz */
00072   t.buf[0] = ITG3200_REG_DLPF_FS;
00073   t.buf[1] = (0x03<<3);
00074   t.len_w = 2;
00075   send_i2c_msg_with_retry(&t);
00076   /* set sample rate to 533Hz */
00077   t.buf[0] = ITG3200_REG_SMPLRT_DIV;
00078   t.buf[1] = 0x0E;
00079   send_i2c_msg_with_retry(&t);
00080   /* switch to gyroX clock */
00081   t.buf[0] = ITG3200_REG_PWR_MGM;
00082   t.buf[1] = 0x01;
00083   send_i2c_msg_with_retry(&t);
00084   /* enable interrupt on data ready, idle high, latch until read any register */
00085   t.buf[0] = ITG3200_REG_INT_CFG;
00086   t.buf[1] = (0x01 | (0x1<<4) | (0x1<<5) | 0x01<<7);
00087   send_i2c_msg_with_retry(&t);
00088 
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 static void configure_accel(void) {
00094 
00095   /* set data rate to 800Hz */
00096   adxl345_write_to_reg(ADXL345_REG_BW_RATE, 0x0D);
00097   /* switch to measurememnt mode */
00098   adxl345_write_to_reg(ADXL345_REG_POWER_CTL, 1<<3);
00099   /* enable data ready interrupt */
00100   adxl345_write_to_reg(ADXL345_REG_INT_ENABLE, 1<<7);
00101   /* Enable full res and interrupt active low */
00102   adxl345_write_to_reg(ADXL345_REG_DATA_FORMAT, 1<<3|1<<5);
00103   /* clear spi rx reg to make DMA happy */
00104   adxl345_clear_rx_buf();
00105   /* reads data once to bring interrupt line up */
00106   adxl345_start_reading_data();
00107 
00108 }
